Data Fields
db_buf_stat_t Struct Reference
C API » Configuration

Statistics on a specific page in the database or buffer in the cache. More...

#include <ittia/db.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t pageno
 Page that is bound to the buffer or -1 if no page is bound. More...
 
db_counter_t pin
 Number of times the page was pinned since it was copied into the cache. More...
 
db_counter_t rank
 Current eviction rank of page. More...
 
int type
 Page type. More...
 
int locked
 True when buffer is locked, false (0) otherwise. More...
 
int fixed
 True when buffer is fixed, false (0) otherwise. More...
 

Detailed Description

Statistics on a specific page in the database or buffer in the cache.

See also
db_stat_buffer, db_stat_page
